cards.title: Complete Ecosystem
cards.desc: ZW&US is not a factory or an industry. It is a full-fledged ecosystem of production, processing, energy, education and social economy, united by a single technology and management platform. Each element strengthens the other: processing creates materials → production creates infrastructure → agro-system creates biomass → food and water → reduces costs → education creates personnel → employment forms social sustainability.

cards.title: 18 Revenue Sources
cards.desc: The system does not depend on a single product. It forms 18 independent revenue streams: RPC materials production, Panel/board sales, Building and hangar construction, furniture, Secondary raw materials, Biomass and soil mixtures seedlings, Technology licensing, Educational programs, Modular space rental, Contract processing, Carbon credits and environmental certificates, Food production, Dairy production, Eco-tourism, Land reclamation and extraction of precious, non-ferrous, rare earth metals, Dispatch services, freight and cargo transportation, Territory greening, Ecosystem and facility design, Health prevention, And much more. This creates financial stability regardless of external crises.

cards.title: Circular Economy
cards.desc: In ZW&US, waste is not destroyed - it is transformed into resources with maximum value for nature and humans. The complete cycle looks like this: Waste collection & RDF → sorting → temporary storage → mobile shredding → RPC composites → panels and beams → infrastructure construction → agro-system → food and water → reuse of waste and resources. No element leaves the system. This ensures Zero Waste and Zero Harm.

cards.title: Ultra-Low Cost
cards.desc: The cost of all materials and products in the ZW&US system is significantly lower than market prices due to: own raw materials (RDF + organic waste), no waste disposal costs, local energy, no long-distance logistics, modular production, high level of automation. This allows producing building materials cheaper than traditional enterprises.

cards.title: Scalability
cards.desc: The ZW&US model is standardized and can be deployed on any territory: city, municipality, industrial hub, agricultural zone, mountain region, region. The technology is designed for scaling to 49,000 territories on the planet within the framework of the planetary sustainable development program.

problem.title: Problem We Solve
problem.desc: The world faces a critical waste situation: the linear economy 'take → use → throw away' has stopped working. Waste is not processed, land is polluted, landfills are growing, and regions are losing billions of dollars due to RDF incineration.

solution.title: Solution Description
solution.desc: The ZW&US system includes: door-to-door dry waste collection, MRF center network, Network of cultural and educational centers, Health center network, mobile RDF shredding, RPC production, building and infrastructure construction, Construction forest production, Food production, Seedling production, Syntropic farming system, energy microgrid, educational and social blocks, digital AI management platform. This is a unified production-social cycle capable of ensuring waste-free territory development and restoring the entire natural ecosystem.
